sen.j: 三野馬甘（みののうまかい)は奈良時代の人。
sen.e: MINO no Umakai (馬甘) was a person of Nara period.
MINO no Umakai (馬甘) was a person of the Nara period.
MINO no Umakai (馬甘) was a person of the Nara period.
Another theory about the letters for his given name is 馬養.
He has another given name, 馬養.
He has another given name, 馬養.

sen.j: 藤原仲麻呂の乱で活躍し、正六位上から従五位下に出世した。
sen.e: He was actively involved in FUJIWARA no Nakamaro's War so that he was promoted from Shorokuinojo (Senior Sixth Rank, Upper Grade) to Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).
He was actively involved in FUJIWARA no Nakamaro's War and he was promoted from Shorokuinojo (Senior Sixth Rank, Upper Grade) to Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).
He was actively involved in FUJIWARA no Nakamaro's War and he was promoted from Shorokuinojo (Senior Sixth Rank, Upper Grade) to Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).

sen.j: 子に三野石守があるというが、大伴旅人の従者とは別人とみられる。
sen.e: Although it is said that he had a son named MINO no Ishimori, he is considered to be the different person from the follower of OTOMO no Tabito.
sen.cmt: 旅人の従者「石守」の読みは「いそもり」と思われますが（http://kotobank.jp/word/%E4%B8%89%E9%87%8E%E7%9F%B3%E5%AE%88）、ウィキペディアでは「いしもり」となっており翻訳ファイル「1642645_三野石守」でもその読みが使用されているため、訳文では"Ishimori"としました。
sen.e: Although it is said that he had a son named MINO no Ishimori, he is considered to be a different person from the follower of OTOMO no Tabito.
Although it is said that he had a son named MINO no Ishimori, he is considered to be a different person from the follower of OTOMO no Tabito.
